title: Who says they’re fighting? It’s just a handshake (Chilean cartoon, 1947)
Text:: Who says they’re fighting? It’s just a handshake.Year  22 August 1947.Publisher  Topaze magazine.Artist  Jorge Délano (or “Coke”).Additional information  The cartoon depicts Stalin and Uncle Sam arm-wrestling over South America. It was drawn by the famous Chilean cartoonist Jorge Délano, also known as “Coke”, for Topaze magazine.
